modules.description: This module provides functions to convert between RDF terms and property values, compare terms, and construct properties with optional transition logic. It works directly with `Rdf.Term.term` and `Stk__Props.prop_value` types. Concrete use cases include handling property transitions in a UI, serializing terms to property values, and creating typed properties with default or inherited values.

This module provides operations for creating and manipulating IRIs in the context of RDF properties, including functions to convert between IRIs and property values, and to construct properties with optional transition logic. It works primarily with `Iri.t` and `Stk__Props.prop_value` types, enabling direct integration with property systems. Concrete use cases include defining RDF properties with custom transitions and serializing or deserializing IRIs to and from property values.

This module provides wrappers for Iri.t and Ptime.t types, along with default time values, to support precise handling of RDF identifiers and timestamps. It includes submodules for converting and manipulating IRIs and RDF terms as property values, with support for transitions and typed property construction. Use cases include defining RDF properties with custom transition logic, serializing IRIs and terms, and managing property values in UI contexts.

This module manages mappings between RDF terms and widgets, providing operations to add, remove, and find widgets by RDF terms. It supports rendering and interaction logic for RDF graphs using a customizable context that includes namespaces, click handlers, and activation callbacks. Concrete use cases include building interactive RDF graph visualizations with clickable terms and dynamic widget associations.

This module handles RDF data through precise IRI and timestamp operations, supporting property value manipulation and typed transitions. It provides utilities for RDF term serialization, widget mappings, and interactive graph rendering. Use cases include RDF property management with custom logic, dynamic widget associations, and interactive RDF visualizations.
